duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage logistics for meetings including organizing agendas, booking meeting rooms, preparing written materials, etc.
Manage administrative tasks including, but not limited to, reports, memos, letters, travel bookings, expense reports, and other documents.
Handle incoming communications and reports and can respond to correspondence on behalf of the CEO and other executives.
Prioritize incoming information and/or appointments and carries out assigned tasks and projects as required.
Develop relationships with internal and external staff to facilitate meeting planning and scheduling (both personal and professional).
Ensure effective flow of meetings; follow up and confirm all meetings in advance.
